definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: Pursuit made excellence, aspiration achieved eminence, unpretentious soared practicality, responsible humbled integrity.
sentences.chinese: 追求卓越，志存高遠，踏實做事，誠信爲人。

sentences.english: I can tell you about lofty goals, but I cannot achieve them for you.
sentences.chinese: 我能教你志存高遠，但不能替你實現目標。

sentences.english: People always want to look at something, toward high and shore up the life and soul.
sentences.chinese: 人總要仰望點什麼，向着高遠，支撐起生命和靈魂。

sentences.english: Your dream must happen to be commerciingequhcommerciing to inspire you.
sentences.chinese: 這個夢得足夠高遠，那才力激勵你。

sentences.english: I love thee to the depth and breath and height my soul can reach.
sentences.chinese: 我愛你，盡我的心靈所能觸及的深邃，寬廣和高遠。

sentences.english: These are very ambitious goals, albeit very worthwhile ones.
sentences.chinese: 這一目標誌向高遠，但卻值得一試。

sentences.english: In Marilyn’s America, there were aspirations.
sentences.chinese: 夢露時代的美國，有着高遠的志向。

sentences.english: I wish eagerly the freedom world in the heart is limpid and farsighted.
sentences.chinese: 我渴望心中的自由世界是清澈而又高遠。

sentences.english: I love thee to the depth and breath and height to my soul can reach. when feeling out of sight.
sentences.chinese: 我愛你之深邃之寬廣之高遠盡我的靈魂所能及之處。

sentences.english: Hanshan's poems were prized by Liu Dajie with Superlative, Free and Natural Mood.
sentences.chinese: 寒山詩歌被劉大傑先生贊爲有“高遠空靈的情趣”。

sentences.english: The sky was high and soft and light outside, though the sun still wasn’t up.
sentences.chinese: 外面的天空高遠，柔和而又明亮，雖然太陽還沒升起。

sentences.english: So, I would like to use blood youth erected for himself a lofty goal.
sentences.chinese: 於是，我想用青春的熱血給自己樹起一個高遠的目標。

sentences.english: Youth burst in the morning sunshine; hopes carry lofty ideals.
sentences.chinese: 青春絢爛於朝陽的新光，希望寄託着高遠的理想。

sentences.english: A girl had a far-reaching aspiration, and she will go farther now, four boys went to see her off.
sentences.chinese: 一位心性高遠的女孩要遠走高飛了，四個男孩去送她。

sentences.english: One personal target is far high, but also wants to face reality of life.
sentences.chinese: 一個人目標高遠，但也要面對現實的生活。

sentences.english: For example, for smash or clear, should be changed forehand grip from this usual grip.
sentences.chinese: 在打高遠球和殺球時，需要改變握拍姿勢爲正手握拍。

definition: to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
scholarship/high-level study/to do scholarly research/to pursue a high level of study
one's bosom (the seat of emotions)/breast/broad-minded and open/to think about/to cherish
to stand tall and see far (idiom); taking the long and broad view/acute foresight
charm or grace (in poetry or art)
